Begin BILL_TT_Anhaedra

;for TT_MaarGan. If you kill the daedra after a successful taunt, you get this journal. Stops the npcs from healing you, etc.
;edited lots

short tauntCount

if ( CellChanged == 1 )
	SetFight 0 
	StopCombat
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex TT_MaarGan >= 30 )
		Journal "TT_MaarGan" 50
	endif
endif

End
